title: Other Facilities - NSRIT
content: Search for: Other Facilities NSRIT > Campus Life > Facilities > Other Facilities Computer Center Library Seminar Hall Transport Cafteria & Hostel Sports Recording Studio Talent Incubation Center Design Space Makers Space Other Facilities Other Facilities Water Plant We have provided RO water plant with a capacity of 500 liters per hour for the purpose of drinking water supply and also we have two bore wells for other usages. Well-ness Center A Doctor is made available in the college to provide medical facility to staff and students. Counseling is also done to the students with Guest lectures. Solar Power Plant Solar Power Plant was inaugurated by Sri. Ganta Srinivasa Rao garu, Hon’ble minister of HRD on 10.05.2018.  The Power generation capacity of the plant is 60 KW. ×
